items.sentence: How many years have you been playing the guitar?
How much do you think Tom will give me for this?
How much does Tom charge you for French lessons?
How much does it cost to get a haircut nowadays?
Tom hacked Mary\'s leg off with a rusty machete.
Tom wasn\'t very hungry, so he didn\'t eat much.
We should\'ve phoned ahead and reserved a table.
This is a problem you have to solve by yourself.
Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
Tom and Mary demanded better working conditions.
Tom and one other person were seriously injured.
Tom arrived in Boston less than three weeks ago.
Tom calls his mother three or four times a week.
Basketball was my favorite sport in high school.
It\'s easy to see the fireworks from over there.
It\'s hard for me to put my thoughts into words.
It\'s not easy being the youngest in the family.
Tom isn\'t sure he\'s ready to perform on stage.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person who\'d lie to you.
I\'m sure that Tom will be pleased to hear that.
